H0.text: Which music act took its name from a Bernard Cribbins hit record. Right Said Fred

H1.text: Which music act took its name from a Bernard Cribbins hit record. Hole in the Wall

H2.text: Which music act took its name from a Bernard Cribbins hit record. The Wombles

H3.text: Which music act took its name from a Bernard Cribbins hit record. Rob Manzoli

A4.text: The group was named after the novelty song 'Right Said Fred', which was a hit single for singer and actor Bernard Cribbins in 1962.
